definition: One careless move and the whole game is lost. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1

sentences.english: The manner of folding a letter, for example, may embody a studied affront.
sentences.chinese: 比如信紙的折法，稍有不慎，就會被當做故意冒犯。

sentences.english: One false move and you will lose their respect and admiration forever. Here are some general rules
sentences.chinese: 一着不慎，你就可能永遠失掉他們的尊敬和崇拜。

sentences.english: In his childhood,he lapsed into some bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 在童年時，他不慎養成了一些壞習慣。

sentences.english: I won at the club level but lost the area contest.
sentences.chinese: 我在分會贏得了比賽，但是在區域會階段卻不慎落馬。

sentences.english: Cloth it rops into the swimming pool, NongJiu up by arrive in time.
sentences.chinese: 布不慎掉入游泳池中，被及時趕到的農救起。

sentences.english: If accidentally sprayed into eyes, immediately rinse with plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 若不慎噴入眼中，請立即用大量清水沖洗乾淨。

sentences.english: The possibility of hurting should inspire an augmentation of respect.
sentences.chinese: 不慎觸及了可能觸及之物應倍增尊敬。

sentences.english: Wash with rinsing when it gets into the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 若不慎進入眼睛，請立刻用清水沖洗乾淨。

sentences.english: In order to prevent I spend over 100 dollars reason of handsome head immodesty drive fire point.
sentences.chinese: 以防止我花了一百多元理的帥頭不慎被火點着。

sentences.english: Once upon a time there was a man who dropped a silver bowl into the sea while crossing it.
sentences.chinese: 從前有一乘船渡海的人，不慎把銀製的器皿掉到海里。

sentences.english: If Ross fell asleep, the baby's mother whipped her.
sentences.chinese: 假如蘿絲不慎睡著了，嬰兒的媽媽會鞭笞她。

sentences.english: One careless loses the whole game.
A girl to a cliff Caihua, accidentally fell into a gorge.
sentences.chinese: 一個少女到懸崖上採花，不慎掉進了峽谷。

sentences.english: S28:After contact with skin, wash immediately with plenty of soap-suds.
sentences.chinese: 不慎與皮膚接觸後，立即用大量肥皂水沖洗。

sentences.english: Fire and water are good servants , but bad masters.
sentences.chinese: 水火可以成爲忠僕，用它不慎成災主。

sentences.english: A man was crossing the river when he accidentally dropped his sword into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子因過河時，不慎掉進他的劍河。

definition: to injure oneself in a fall
to fall and break/to break (bones) by falling
to lose one's footing/to slip/to take a wrong step in life
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
